Module io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern

Interface PatternKeyword

public interface PatternKeyword
A pattern keyword instance is the content of percent encoded keywords in a pattern.

    • opt

      default <T> T opt(int index, T fallback, Function<String,T> f)
      Helper to get values from optionList().
      Type Parameters:
      T - converted type.
      Parameters:
      index - zero based index in option list.
      fallback - if optionList does not have a value at the index use this value.
      f - function to call for conversion.
      Returns:
      value.
